commnet: This was our first time working with Globas. The team is very efficient, works on a tight timeline with very open communication. They understood the need of the project clearly and was able to deliver the end product with great ease. Thank you. Looking forward to working on many more projects.

abstrac: To make IT as an enabler, enabling Clients, Stakeholders, Employees thereby creating a divine eco system where everyone grows together
bio:
Global Smart Technologies and Solution Pvt Ltd referred as Globas is a rapidly expanding IT Development and Consulting Organization. Born at Sydney in 2002 and now we operate across the world at Sydney, Melbourne, New York, London, Cologne, Coimbatore, Chennai and Madurai. Our team is enhanced with over 250 management consultants, design gurus and software architects and still growing.

We are a Multi-National and Multi-Cultural team providing solutions to our global clients.

abstrac: A team of Mobile and Web experts - Biznesport.pl
bio:
BiznesPort is a creative agency that specialize in designing websites, all sorts of applications, content management systems (CMS) and complex system and programming solutions, which effectively support business management, for example Customer Relationship management systems (CRM).

BiznesPort was founded in 2006 by a group of professional web developers, whose qualifications and foreknowledge represent possibly the best quality of web design on the market.

These are a few things we usually do for our customers:

    landing pages, websites, social networking websites,
    desktop, mobile and dedicated applications,
    marketing and advertising campaigns e.g. ATL, BTL, ambient, Public Realtions, CSR, whisper marketing, Google AdWords,
    and many more!

Our philosophy

An effective increase in the company, invented the small group of lucky employees, who know how to combine passion with profession. From the very beginning cooperation with ambitious people inspired us the most.
BiznesPort = Quality + Efficiency + Safety

Studies show that the most important factor when choosing a product is quality rather than price. Thai is why we can guarantee that our products, due to their quality and durability, will serve our consumers longer and, with hindsight, they will turn out to be much cheaper!

Our products are inspected by a strict quality control. We monitor them on every stage - from the beginning, to the very end. Even then, our role does not end. After leaving our 'workshop', the product is still being monitored by our IT specialists.
